narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This 1st prelicense inspection and exit briefing for a Class "C" license was conducted with the applicant, Alexandra
Andricos, VMO and Tyler Fields, VMO.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
 
Additional Inspectors
Andricos Alexandra, Veterinary Medical Officer
